title: How do I list my property?
content: To list your property, simply click on 'List Your Property', fill in the required details, upload photos, and submit your listing for review.

title: Are all listings verified?
content: Yes, all properties on our platform are carefully verified by our team to ensure authenticity and accuracy before being published.

title: How can I contact an agent?
content: You can contact an agent directly through the property page by using the provided contact form or phone number.

title: What fees are involved for sellers?
content: Listing your property is free. However, a small commission may apply upon successful sale, which will be clearly communicated before you finalize your listing.

title: Can I schedule a property visit?
content: Yes, you can request a property visit by clicking the 'Schedule Visit' button on the property page and selecting your preferred date and time.

title: How do I search for properties?
content: Use our advanced search filters to find properties by location, price, type, and other criteria that match your needs.

title: Is my personal data safe?
content: We prioritize your privacy and use advanced security measures to protect your personal information on our platform.

title: Can I save favorite properties?
content: Yes, you can save your favorite properties by clicking the heart icon. Access your saved listings anytime from your profile.
